item.title: WebStorm 2024.2 EAP Digest #1: Better Tools Configuration Support, Svelte 5, Git Enhancements, and More
item.description: We’ve kicked off WebStorm 2024.2 with a new Early Access Program (EAP). Please check out this blog post, where we explain the benefits of the program. If you haven’t already seen what to expect in WebStorm 2024.2, take a moment to explore our roadmap. The Toolbox App is the easiest way to get the EAP […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/webstorm/2024/05/webstorm-2024-2-eap1/
